raw_body: Beloved wife of late Mervyn Brindley Fernando, loving mother of Avril, Lorraine, Cheryl and Rayen, mother-in-law of Aubrey, Erajh, Travice and Rosemary, grandmother of Alaine, Yohan and Irandi, Dinuk and Dhineli, Ayuni, Erajh and Charini, Janice, Michael and Cecilia, Nigel and Casey, Steve and Kayla, Stephan, Colleen. Precious Granny of 19 great-grandchildren. Viewing on Friday 15th March at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour from 9.00 a.m. onwards.
